content: In a small town, there are 5 houses in a row. Each house is painted a different color and has a person of a different nationality living in it. The Englishman lives in the red house. The Spaniard owns a dog. Coffee is drunk in the green house. The Ukrainian drinks tea. The green house is immediately to the right of the ivory house. The man who eats snails lives in the yellow house. Milk is drunk in the middle house. The Norwegian lives in the first house. The man who keeps horses lives next to the one who smokes Dunhill. The man who smokes Blends lives next to the one who keeps cats. The man who smokes Pall Mall keeps birds. The German smokes Prince. The Norwegian lives next to the blue house. The man who smokes Blends has a neighbor who drinks water. Who owns the fish?
